1: לְ֭כוּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>come</n> נְרַנְּנָ֣ה <sup>7442 </sup> <n>let us sing</n> לַיהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> נָ֝רִ֗יעָה <sup>7321 </sup> <n>let us make a joyful noise</n> לְצ֣וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>to the rock</n> יִשְׁעֵֽנוּ׃ <sup>3468 </sup> <n>of our salvation</n>
2: נְקַדְּמָ֣ה <sup>6923 </sup> <n>Let us come</n> פָנָ֣יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before his presence</n> בְּתוֹדָ֑ה <sup>8426 </sup> <n>with thanksgiving</n> בִּ֝זְמִר֗וֹת <sup>2158 </sup> <n>unto him with psalms</n> נָרִ֥יעַֽ <sup>7321 </sup> <n>and make a joyful noise</n> לֽוֹ׃
3: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֣ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> גָּד֣וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>[is] a great</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For the LORD</n> וּמֶ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>King</n> גָּ֝ד֗וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>and a great</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>above all gods</n>
4: אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whose</n> בְּ֭יָדוֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>In his hand</n> מֶחְקְרֵי־ <sup>4278 </sup> <n>[are] the deep places</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וְתוֹעֲפ֖וֹת <sup>8443 </sup> <n>the strength</n> הָרִ֣ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of the hills</n> לֽוֹ׃
5: אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> ל֣וֹ הַ֭יָּם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>The sea</n> וְה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> עָשָׂ֑הוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[is] his and he made</n> וְ֝יַבֶּ֗שֶׁת <sup>3006 </sup> <n>the dry</n> יָדָ֥יו <sup>3027 </sup> <n>it and his hands</n> יָצָֽרוּ׃ <sup>3335 </sup> <n>formed</n>
6: בֹּ֭אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>O come</n> נִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֣ה <sup>7812 </sup> <n>let us worship</n> וְנִכְרָ֑עָה <sup>3766 </sup> <n>and bow down</n> נִ֝בְרְכָ֗ה <sup>1288 </sup> <n>let us kneel</n> לִֽפְנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> עֹשֵֽׂנוּ׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>our maker</n>
7: כִּ֘י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ה֤וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>For he [is] our God</n> וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> עַ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and we [are] the people</n> מַ֭רְעִיתוֹ <sup>4830 </sup> <n>of his pasture</n> וְצֹ֣אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>and the sheep</n> יָד֑וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of his hand</n> הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>To day</n> אִֽם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> בְּקֹל֥וֹ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>his voice</n> תִשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>if ye will hear</n>
8: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּקְשׁ֣וּ <sup>7185 </sup> <n>Harden</n> לְ֭בַבְכֶם <sup>3824 </sup> <n>not your heart</n> כִּמְרִיבָ֑ה <sup>4808 </sup> <n>as in the provocation</n> כְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[and] as [in] the day</n> מַ֝סָּ֗ה <sup>4531 </sup> <n>of temptation</n> בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <sup>4057 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n>
9: אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>When</n> נִ֭סּוּנִי <sup>5254 </sup> <n>tempted</n> אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>When your fathers</n> בְּ֝חָנ֗וּנִי <sup>974 </sup> <n>me proved</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>though</n> רָא֥וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>me and saw</n> פָעֳלִֽי׃ <sup>6467 </sup> <n>my work</n>
10: אַרְבָּ֘עִ֤ים <sup>705 </sup> <n>Forty</n> שָׁנָ֨ה ׀ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> אָ֘ק֤וּט <sup>6962 </sup> <n>long was I grieved</n> בְּד֗וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>with [this] generation</n> וָאֹמַ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> עַ֤ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>It [is] a people</n> תֹּעֵ֣י <sup>8582 </sup> <n>that do err</n> לֵבָ֣ב <sup>3824 </sup> <n>in their heart</n> הֵ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> וְ֝הֵ֗ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָדְע֥וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and they have not known</n> דְרָכָֽי׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>my ways</n>
11: אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <sup>7650 </sup> <n>Unto whom I sware</n> בְאַפִּ֑י <sup>639 </sup> <n>in my wrath</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Truly</n> יְ֝בֹא֗וּן <sup>935 </sup> <n>that they should not enter</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> מְנוּחָתִֽי׃ <sup>4496 </sup> <n>into my rest</n>
